amendment.description: To require the Director of the Peace Corps to notify and consult with the Committees on Appropriations before opening, closing, significantly reducing, or suspending a domestic or overseas office or country program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2209 proposed by Senator Rounds for Senator Corker. (consideration: CR S1691; text: CR S1691) To require the Director of the Peace Corps to notify and consult with the Committees on Appropriations before opening, closing, significantly reducing, or suspending a domestic or overseas office or country program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2209 proposed by Senator Rounds for Senator Corker.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
